short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A New-Tab Welcoming Screen. Features A Video Of London

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a new tab welcoming screen. It features a tour video of London. We also include a time section. The time updates every minute! The tab also includes an easy and quick search bar that searches google. We also include the ability to move widgets so it can fit your screen!
